reviews.text: Stayed here on a short business trip, got a reduced rate which for Zurich was not bad. No breakfast but not a problem for me, made my own! Room was small but with a good size comfortable bed, nice shower, TV, nespresso machine and fridge. Room was above the bar which although quiet on the first night was very loud the following night but as this was November11th (the beginning of Karnival/Fasnacht I was told), it might have been the exception. The old town was certainly full of bands etc. all day and into the night.
reviews.title: Perfect Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The best thing about this hotel was it's location, especially if you need to be handy for the city centre. Tram (Rathaus) stops almost outside and it's only 2 or 3 stops from the main station. The airport tram (No. 10) is also just 2 stops away, easily walked if dry and not carrying too much luggage. Also loads of bars and restaurants very close by.

reviews.text: Key code system works well but just one word of warning-- if you enter your code and think you hear keycard drop but nothing appears don't despair; push your hand up into the slot and you should feel it....sometimes gets stuck and doesn't drop properly.
